messages.title: Change
messages.content: VOTE FOR CHANGE Mary Macleod: Plan for change - not more of the same. VOTE MARY MACLEOD Your new voice in Parliament.

messages.title: THE DANGERS OF A HUNG PARLIAMENT
messages.content: In a hung Parliament, smaller, opportunist parties calling the shots would make it harder to deal decisively with our economic problems.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plan for change - not more of the same. Smaller government, reducing the fiscal deficit, low taxes to create jobs.
Conservatives back the NHS. As your MP, Mary would protect our local health services.
Support local shops and local businesses. Mary has the experience to help local businesses thrive.
Controlled immigration: Reducing it and the strain on local services.

issues.economy: Smaller government, reducing the fiscal deficit, low taxes to create jobs.
issues.environment: The Conservatives say 'NO' to a third runway.
issues.governance: In a hung Parliament, smaller, opportunist parties calling the shots would make it harder to deal decisively with our economic problems.
issues.immigration: Controlled immigration: Reducing it and the strain on local services.

quotes.text: Mary is a dynamo - she is exactly the sort of person we need in Parliament. - David Cameron

images.caption: Mary Macleod with family and supporters.
Mary Macleod engaging with the community.
